name: World of Warships: Legends — Naval Legend: Mikasa
name_original: World of Warships: Legends — Naval Legend: Mikasa
description:
Mikasa is famous for her role in the Battle of Tsushima. She served with distinction throughout both the Russo-Japanese war and World War I. Mikasa is preserved today as the only surviving pre-dreadnought battleship.

In this free bundle, Mikasa also comes with a ton of supplies! Set sail on this legend with: - 3 days of Premium Account - Plenty of boosters - A ton of Commander XP - Lots of camouflages - 1 million credits
